pullRequest.title: [Integration] ElasticIP APIs Compatible with OpenStack
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR includes the following change:

remove private ip version attribute from EIP
add port details attribute to EIP
add floatingip related models
add transfrom process between EIP and FIP in apigateway
fix a bug that found in the integration test：allocation availiable buckets bitset should be initialized to false

commit.message: upload elastic ip openstack integration codes
upload elastic ip openstack integration codes
set 'tags' and 'port-details' initial values in a response of floatingip

nodes.bodyText: Is this entity used by OpenStack only? If not we could use more generic name.

nodes.bodyText: This fields are related to one of the microservices in planing - external DNS manager.

+    @JsonProperty("dns_domain")

nodes.bodyText: FloatingIpRequest and FloatingIpResponse have a few common fields that are defined in CustomerResources. Should be a good idea to inherit from it.
